meanings.definition: A plate at the end of something, such as a bone or muscle fiber.
meanings.sent1: The endplate of the bone provides support and protection.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the structure of the endplate in the muscle fiber.
meanings.sent3: The endplate of the bone decided to take a break from all the heavy lifting.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an endplate, firmly holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The shiny endplate of the muscle fiber gleamed under the microscope.

meanings.definition: The terminal portion of a nerve fiber.
meanings.sent1: The doctor carefully examined the endplate of the nerve fiber.
meanings.sent2: Signals travel through the endplate to transmit information.
meanings.sent3: The endplate of the nerve fiber threw a party for all the signals passing through.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as an endplate, connecting hearts and minds.
meanings.sent5: The fragile endplate of the nerve fiber required delicate handling during surgery.
